title: Heroes A2Z #9: Ivy League All-Stars
description: They're mean!They're green!They're a baseball team!In this adventure, it’s time to play ball. The heroes batter up against the Garden City Sprouts in the Little League championship game. First it’s one up and then everybody down. The Sprouts players sprout into pinch-hitting plants. This game is going into extra innings.
author: David Anthony
